snippet: The actions are jeopardizing the national economy and tightening world oil supplies at a time when unrest is spreading in the Middle East.
abstract: Protests and strikes at several large export terminals and oil fields are throttling Libya’s daily oil production to one-tenth its capacity; actions are jeopardizing the national economy and tightening world oil supplies at a time when unrest is spreading in the Middle East; Libyan government issues arrest warrants for strike leaders, setting up a potentially critical showdown.
lead_paragraph: The actions are jeopardizing the national economy and tightening world oil supplies at a time when unrest is spreading in the Middle East.

headline.main: In Libya, Unrest Brings Oil Industry to Standstill
headline.print_headline: In Libya, Unrest Brings Oil Industry To Standstill
